com.tyrlib2.graphics.renderer

Class ProgramManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tyrlib2.graphics.renderer.ProgramManager

  • public class ProgramManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class takes care of linking and compiling programs and cashing the result

    Sascha

      • destroy

      • createProgram

        public Program createProgram(java.lang.String programName,
                    Context context,
                    int vertexShaderResId,
                    int fragmentShaderResId,
                    java.lang.String[] bindAttributes)
        Creates a new program. The passed ressources will be loaded an receive the name PROGRAMNAME_VS and PROGRAMNAME_FS respectively.
        Parameters:
        programName - The name of the program. Vertexshader and fragmentshader will receive the suffix _vs and _fs respectively.
        context - The context from where the ressources can be loaded
        vertexShaderResId - The id of the ressource containing the vertex shader
        fragmenShaderResId - The id of the ressource contaiing the fragment shader
        Returns:
        The compiled program

      • getProgram

        public Program getProgram(java.lang.String programName)
        Gets a compiled OpenGL program
        Parameters:
        programName - Name of the program
        Returns:
        A handle to the compiled program

      • recreateAll

        public void recreateAll()
        Recreate all current programs
